author: Adrian Leonhard <adrianleonhard@gmail.com> (https://github.com/NaridaL)
description: Boundary representation volume modeling in TypeScript.
name: brepts

scripts.build: tsc && rollup -c && rollup -c rollup.module.config.js && npm run minify
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/bundle.js --output dist/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs dist/bundle.module.js --output dist/bundle.module.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npm run lint && npm test
